name: Moonwhisper Crystal
description: A delicate crystal formation embedded within the wall, pulsating with a soft silver light that mirrors the convergence of moonbeams. Its facets reflect hues of lunar cycles and whisper secrets to those attuned to its gentle hum.

name: Stardust Earrings
description: Delicate, crystalline earrings infused with stardust from a bygone era. They glimmer softly, reflecting the celestial ballet in shades of blue and silver.

name: Ancient Star Chart
description: A tattered parchment containing cryptic star maps and celestial navigation charts from a bygone era. The ink appears ancient but still whispers the mysteries of the cosmos to those who listen closely.
